title: Ferrari Tony
description: This week we're joined by Venice local by way of the UK; Mr. Tony Rackley (aka Ferrari Tony).  Tony has lived one hell of a life and shares stories of emergency panamanian boat repairs, partying on the Sunset Strip, sailing with Sex Pistols and his love for early british punk.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
